column4: Has anyone any experience with 'TestDisk' I've been running it all night, and it seems to have got stuck at 75% and going really really slow, with a very occasional click of the drive as it spins.... Does this mean there's a hardware failure?
you could take a look at  photorec  (part of the testdisk package) to try and get as much data off it to another drive as you can
I have only used them on FAT partitions successfully thus far though
